page.title: 09SHOPPING IN NORTH HYKEHAM
page.content: There are quite afew shops in the area.One group of shops is called The Forum. There is also a hypermarket called Asda which belongs to Associated Dairies.Over 20,000 people a week shop at Asda.There have a garden centre and Petrol Station on the same site. There are many corner shops which are usually newsagents and off-licences. There are chemist shops,hairdressers, antique shops,fish and chip shops,and one betting shop in the area. Lincoln is only 3miles away and most people seem to go there for clothes and shoes although these are available in North Hykeham
